Class Message

  • java.lang.Object
    • Message

  • public class Message
extends java.lang.Object

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Message.Type 

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      int blockIndex
      Block index indicates which block this is, as sent by sender.
      int blockOffset
      The first sequence number of this message's block.
      int blockSize
      The number of messages comprising this message's block.
      byte[] data
      Data sent in message (probably ASCII representation of a string, but maybe part of attachment)
      long date
      Date message was created Determines order in which messages should be displayed.
      static int MAX_PIECE
      Defines the maximum size of a "Piece", in bytes.
      int senderID
      Unique Sender identifier.
      int sequenceNumber
      Sequence number as sent by sender.
      Message.Type type
      Is this message part of a text message or a file? Default to text.

    • Field Detail

      • type

        public Message.Type type
        Is this message part of a text message or a file? Default to text.

      • MAX_PIECE

        public static final int MAX_PIECE
        Defines the maximum size of a "Piece", in bytes.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • data

        public byte[] data
        Data sent in message (probably ASCII representation of a string, but maybe part of attachment)

      • senderID

        public int senderID
        Unique Sender identifier.

      • blockIndex

        public int blockIndex
        Block index indicates which block this is, as sent by sender. If a large block (a file's data or large text typed in) is broken into smaller pieces, those pieces are the message and each message gets the same block index.

      • blockOffset

        public int blockOffset
        The first sequence number of this message's block.

      • blockSize

        public int blockSize
        The number of messages comprising this message's block.

      • sequenceNumber

        public int sequenceNumber
        Sequence number as sent by sender. So if this is the fifth message the sender wrote, sequenceNumber is 4.

      • date

        public long date
        Date message was created Determines order in which messages should be displayed. Time in milliseconds, determined by System.currentTimeMillis()

    • Constructor Detail

      • Message

        public Message(Message.Type type,
       byte[] data,
       int senderID,
       int blockIndex,
       int blockOffset,
       int blockSize,
       int sequenceNumber,
       long date)
        Parameters:
        data - The content of the message.
        senderID - The unique identifier of the sending User.
        sequenceNumber - The index of the message as sent by the sender.
